column3:
Maru is plotting something tasty.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Deliver steaming victuals and amra to workers in the jungle.
You got time to spare? 'Cause I've got grub to share. Specifically with the folks protectin' the ruins an' temples in the Shroud of the Samgha...
Here, take these sweets an' eats an' follow the sound of rumblin' bellies. Tell them the Hippo Riders sent you...
What ho! Is something the matter?
For me? Why, my greatest thanks to you, good <If(PlayerParameter(4))>woman<Else/>man</If>!
Of all the things to encounter in these jungles, a warm meal is a welcome surprise indeed.
We have resumed our regular patrols, so you may rest easy under the watchful eye of the Radiant Host. Be sure to pass along my regards to your Riders!
If it isn't <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>! What brings you out this far?
Warm vittles with ripe amra for dessert! Why, my empty stomach was just serenading me with discontent but moments ago─might you have heard it?
If this aroma is to be believed, I daresay I shall soon become a true fanatic of the Hippo Riders' meal service. My thanks to you!
Oh, hello! Have you business with me?
Who would I be to deny such delectable generosity? I humbly accept!

We are by no means yet free of the shadow of misfortune, but it is precisely for this reason that I became a steward. After I have partaken in your kindness, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>madam<Else/>sir</If>, I shall finish the rest of my rounds with vigor!
Those temples an' ruins are important parts of our culture, so sendin' out the occasional warm meal to our guardians is the least we can do. Here's a little somethin' for you, too...
